com.camerontec.catalys.server.management.mxbean.configuration.rules

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.management.mxbean.configuration.rules.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Represents the configuration of a Catalys Rules Engine Rule.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rule

        @ConstructorProperties(value={"direction","description","inclusions","exclusions","actions","disabled","defaultCase"})
public Rule(String direction,
                                                                                                                                   String description,
                                                                                                                                   List<Condition> inclusions,
                                                                                                                                   List<Condition> exclusions,
                                                                                                                                   List<Action> actions,
                                                                                                                                   boolean disabled,
                                                                                                                                   boolean defaultCase)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction of this rule configuration
        description - description of the rule
        inclusions - inclusive conditions
        exclusions - exclusive conditions
        actions - actions
        disabled - 'true' for a rule that is disabled. Anything else will be a 'false' which means the rule is active.
        defaultCase - 'true' for a default rule.

      • Rule

        @ConstructorProperties(value={"direction","description","inclusions","exclusions","actions","disabled"})

                                                                                                                     String description,
                                                                                                                     List<Condition> inclusions,

                                                                                                                     boolean disabled)

        Parameters:
        direction - direction of this rule configuration
        description - description of the rule
        inclusions - inclusive conditions
        exclusions - exclusive conditions
        actions - actions
        disabled - 'true' for a rule that is disabled. Anything else will be a 'false' which means the rule is active.
